summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for ToolNest mobile app. All 17 required user flows tested and passed successfully. All mocked functionality (Google auth, tool processing, subscription) working as expected. Mobile UI renders correctly with proper spacing, touch targets, and navigation.

react_native_issues.issue: Console warning: 'shadow*' style props are deprecated. Use 'boxShadow'
react_native_issues.note: React Native for Web deprecation warning. Does not affect functionality or mobile app. Can be safely ignored or fixed by replacing shadow* props with boxShadow in StyleSheet objects.

react_native_issues.issue: Console warning: 'props.pointerEvents is deprecated. Use style.pointerEvents'
react_native_issues.note: Another React Native for Web warning. Does not impact mobile functionality.

test_coverage.splash_screen: ✓ Loads correctly, auto-redirects to login in ~2s
test_coverage.login_screen: ✓ All content visible (Welcome, features, Google button). Mocked login (1.5s) works correctly
test_coverage.home_screen: ✓ Greeting shows 'Hey, Alex', usage card displays correctly, all 5 tool cards visible
test_coverage.tool_cards: ✓ All 5 tools render: Summary AI, PDF Merge, PDF Compress, Resume Fix, BG Remover
test_coverage.tool_screen: ✓ Upload area, file selection, Process button all working. Mocked processing (2s) works
test_coverage.result_display: ✓ Success badge, description, Download and New File buttons all present
test_coverage.navigation: ✓ All navigation flows work (tool cards → tool screen, back button, paywall redirect)
test_coverage.usage_tracking: ✓ Counter increments correctly (0→1→2→3 of 3 free uses), progress bar updates
test_coverage.paywall: ✓ Displays after limit reached, shows all content (value props, plans, subscribe button)
test_coverage.subscription: ✓ Mocked upgrade works, PRO badge appears, usage shows 'Unlimited'
test_coverage.logout: ✓ Profile button logs out and returns to login screen
test_coverage.state_management: ✓ App state persists correctly across navigation, resets on logout

flows_tested: 4. Home screen initial state (0 of 3 uses)
6. Tool card navigation to tool screen
8. Result card with success badge and buttons
9. New File button resets tool screen
15. PRO badge and unlimited usage display
BONUS: Paywall close button returns to home
screenshots_captured: 12_final_state.png - Final state after re-login and paywall test
action_items: (OPTIONAL) Replace shadow* props with boxShadow in theme.ts shadows object to remove React Native for Web deprecation warnings
(OPTIONAL) Review pointerEvents usage if any explicit props.pointerEvents are used
critical_code_review_comments: ✓ All React Native components used correctly (View, Text, TouchableOpacity)
✓ All text properly wrapped in Text components
✓ All interactive elements have testID attributes for testing
✓ Styling done via StyleSheet.create() - proper approach
✓ Touch targets adequate (44px+ for all buttons)
✓ Context API used properly for state management
✓ Mocked functionality clearly implemented with setTimeout as specified
✓ Code is clean, well-organized, and follows React Native best practices
seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - all functionality is mocked with hardcoded values
context_for_next_testing_agent: App is fully functional with all screens and flows working correctly. Only minor console warnings present (React Native for Web deprecations) that do not affect functionality. All mocked delays work as expected (login: 1.5s, processing: 2s). State management via Context API is solid.

mocked_functionality_status.google_auth: ✓ Working - Uses setTimeout(1500ms) to simulate auth
mocked_functionality_status.tool_processing: ✓ Working - Uses setTimeout(2000ms) to simulate processing
mocked_functionality_status.subscription_upgrade: ✓ Working - Immediate state change to isPro: true
mocked_functionality_status.file_upload: ✓ Working - Shows hardcoded file info (sample_document.pdf, 2.4 MB)
